products.title: Magnum, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: A golden-hued woody shade, and with sliding translucent strips between the double-layered fabric, the magnum in brown is both attractive and functional. The overhead rail cassette hides the controls from view, making for a clean and streamlined effect. Add the brown to a forest green colour scheme, allowing the wood-look hue to complement the outdoorsy green. Include plenty of natural woods in the room and accent throughout with organic, forest and sage greens, deep browns, and understated golds for a coordinated and coherent look.

products.description: Their kana collection of pleated free-hanging blinds features all of their favourite contemporary neutrals and bright colours. Their hazelnut latte colour is a warm, mid toned brown perfect to complement walnut furniture or other natural wood tones in your rooms. products.title: Faux Suede, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Imagine your ideal coffee-coloured blind with a fabric just as soft and creamy, and you have the gorgeous faux suede in latte. The gentle fawn colour complements the softness of the suede-feel cloth to create a luxurious and touchable look. The latte will work well in a living room or den to provide a taming neutral to deep chocolate browns and dark forest greens. Furnish the room with plenty of natural woods, both dark and medium, and accent throughout with muted brushed golds.

products.title: Devonshire, Light Brown - Roman Blind
products.description: Introduce a sophisticated and stylish look to your home with the devonshire in light brown, where biscuit and taupe threads fuse to form a distinct look with a washed denim effect, creating a casual blind with subtle texture and harmonising hues. Blend the light brown with opulent linens and fresh bursts of ivory to create a clean and contemporary palette, enriching the blind with complementary fabrics in warm caramel and mocha tones for and elegant feel, and adding bursts of gold for a touch of luxe.

products.title: Real Wood Rich Coffee Bean Perfect Fit
products.description: The rich coffee bean perfect fit is a rich chocolate colour and is one of the darkest woods in their range. This blind works well in any decor due to its warm and soft nature, pairing well with mahogany furnishings. As with all their real wood perfect fits, a matching real wood venetian blind is available for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Latte Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A cool khaki tone with a high-beam shine, latte gloss ideal for more rustic environments with a lot of neutral woodgrain or fabric furnishings. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Chateau Blockout Hazelnut Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their hazelnut colour - a warm, mid toned brown perfect to complement walnut furniture or other natural wood tones in your rooms.

products.title: Cellular Blackout Chocolate Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Delphinium, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: Form an artistic and individual space by including the attractive watercoloured print of the delphinium caramel blind. An array of dove grey, caramel, and oatmeal forms an artsy floral print on a relaxed and nimble cloth, showcasing creative personality with little effort. Combine the caramel with a soothing biscuit base for a relaxed and welcoming feel, adding soft furnishings and layered fabrics in gracious shades of slate grey, oatmeal, and honey.

products.title: Maurice, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and chocolatey, the maurice in chocolate is the height of luxe. This roman blind keeps it simple though, letting its gorgeously textured fabric and rich coffee hue speak for themselves, without pattern or fuss. The neutrality of the chocolate makes it an adaptable buddy for accompanying a wide range of design and colour schemes, so feel free to take your pick when it comes to backdrops and accents.

products.title: Faux Suede, Dark Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a luxurious and inviting feel in any surrounding with the faux suede in delicious dark chocolate, where a blend of fine threads form a sultry suede effect for a modern blind full of tempting texture and contemporary style. Create a welcoming and cosy living room by complementing the dark chocolate with alike velvety materials and sumptuous linens, incorporating the deep brown hue with similar cocoa tones and caramel hints for a delectable and everlasting palette of dessert-inspired shades.

products.title: Magnum, Light Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: Chocolate brown threads gently interject a golden canvas in the magnum in light brown, where the translucent strips add texture and style as well as versatile practicality. This blind is ideal for maintaining your privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light into the room. Make the most of the varying shades of the light brown by opting for a brown and gold colour scheme in the living room. Blend with luxurious chocolate fabrics and brushed gold features for the ultimate in style and elegance.

products.title: Sicily, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: In subtle mocha and golden taupe, the sicily chocolate is simply delectable. Pretty diamonds emboss the plain fabric, and further adornments come in the form of fluffy tufts of coffee on top, adding texture and depth to this discreetly glamorous blind. Fashion a classic brown, gold, and cream scheme in the spare bedroom so that your guests can relax in comfort and style, making themselves at home.

products.title: Maurice, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: Impress your guests with the elegant and alluring maurice in caramel, showcasing a sophisticated neutral shade of honeyed beige and presented on a plush, velvety cloth made from silky thread for enriching texture and a tempting golden sheen. Merge the glossy caramel with beguiling shades of buttery cream, taupe, and mocha for a heavenly and inviting palette. Incorporate soft furnishings and plush throws with dreamy, downy textures, adding eye-catching gilded ornaments and golden accessories for a luxuriant finish with traditional style.

products.title: Shine, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a golden bronze, the shine in brown offers a gentle, appealing shimmer that catches the light beautifully. To allow flexible light and privacy, a sheer strip can be moved up and down between the pretty gold fabric, making for practicality as well as style. Use the brown to offset deep chocolate and coffee shades to create a feeling of luxury and opulence in your living room. Choose a gentle mocha tone for two of the walls, leaving those remaining in cream, and furnish with rich brown woods and golden accents.

products.title: Grove, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: A pretty country roman blind, the grove in auburn features artistic florals in autumnal tones of red, rust, lilac, and green, among others, and the look is strikingly understated. The cotton fabric means it's soft and supple yet strong and sturdy, so will sit beautifully in neat roman folds. The auburn surely belongs in the kitchen, set amidst other country hues. Think cream walls and sage green kitchen units and cupboards, with rusty oranges and rural mauves accenting across the board.

products.title: Lottie Auburn Orange Curtain
products.description: The lottie auburn orange curtain is coloured in a warm muted orange tone that will bring a pop of colour to an earthy interior or complement a vibrant scheme. The poly-cotton fabric boasts a woven jacquard finish that embellishes the fern leaf design with an element of texture. products.title: Windsor, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous in soft, vintage gold, the windsor latte is reminiscent of creamy coffee or warm, sticky caramel, making it a delectable and attractive blind. Texture is added to the silky soft fabric using slightly raised ribbing scattered occasionally across its surface. Set the latte against a bold cornflower blue, using it as both a tempering neutral and an highlighting accent to make the blue truly pop.

products.title: Paradise, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes. Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully.

products.title: Feather, Coffee - Roman Blind
products.description: As easy on the eye as a feather is soft to the touch, the feather in coffee blends a classic image with contemporary styling and warming colour. A latte shade takes centre stage, with feathers drawn in soft cream, giving a pretty, lightweight look and feel to the blind. Add the warmth of the coffee to a similarly toned bedroom, surrounding with shades of cream and latte throughout the room. Go for rich, plush fabrics for a feeling of homeliness and luxury, giving the room plenty of texture and depth.

products.description: Splash taupe brown is a soft light brown perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous brown blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Chocolate Brown Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Chocolate brown is a stunning, rich shade. We think this colour works perfectly paired with wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Woodland, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat folds that make the roman blind so special. Go for an autumn-themed living room by surrounding the auburn with similar green and brown colours in natural tones. Choose natural woods, jute rugs, and plenty of wools, accenting throughout with the occasional deep forest green and chocolate brown to add depth and interest.

products.title: Nova, Walnut - Roman Blind
products.description: The smooth, moccasin-feel nova walnut offers an appetising chocolate brown, giving it a cosy and warm look and feel. Detailing is added using tiny zigzag patterning in contrasting brown shades, providing this blind with depth and texture. Use the walnut as part of a snug living room or den, accompanied by country cream walls and medium woods. For an accent colour, opt for a soft aqua or duck egg for a modern and calming feel, or shimmering gold for a touch of glamour.

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash mocha brown panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This dark brown dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash taupe brown panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The light brown panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash latte brown panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Kent, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curving roman arches. Team the chocolate with softer lattes, oatmeals, and creams for a cosy and warm ambience in the living room. Opt for polished woods, whether light, medium, or dark, and use shimmering or brushed golds to add an understated sense of glamour to the room.

products.title: Kent, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: In a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and will match a wide range of stronger, bolder hues. Couple the caramel with a jet black for a contemporary yet opulent finish in a new-build's living room. You, and your guests, will love this sumptuous colour combination, which is easily accented with gold and black soft furnishings and accessories.
